comments.en:
Works in color and bw at 600 Bidirectional/1200dpi printing is not yet supported.
Alignment and head cleaning supported by sending data files to the raw device. These files available at the driver site.
DryingTime an black-only run time parameters.
The photo cartridge in not supported.
A description of the protocol is at http://www.powerup.com.au/~pbwest/lexmark/protocol.html
Also works about as well with the Lexmark 7000 driver kit; see that printer for more information.

Consumables/Refills: Cartridges: Black, Colour, Photo
